feed.title: File Browser Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for File Browser: v2.35.0
entry.content:
Docker Image Updates

The Docker image has been updated recently, with breaking changes. Read the release notes from v2.33.0 to learn how to upgrade.

Changelog

  • 8ef8f2c09803fe5d75c673e7c7fe2d5595c3f9c3 chore(release): 2.35.0
  • 3b3df83d648c0156ee09d33f695acefda58af404 docs: add warning to command runner
  • 38d0366acf88352b5a9a97c45837b0f865efae0b fix: update documentation links
  • 4403cd35720dbda5a8bb1013b92582accf3317bc fix: shell value must be joined by blank space
  • 8d7522049ced83f28f0933b55772c32e3ad04627 feat: Long press selects item in single click mode
  • 7b43cfb1dcb6fd831f2384205d58278bf1f2eed7 docs: improve fail2ban filter
  • d644744417f6d3b3ad2a55dbab5f4313f78c6e5f docs: add fail2ban instructions

entry.title: New release for File Browser: v2.36.0
entry.content:
Updated Icons

This is especially important for those using the branding customization to override the icons and logotype. We have removed deprecated icons that are no longer needed.

The following icons have been removed: - mstile-* - safari-pinned-tab.svg - favicon-16x16.png - favicon-32x32.png

The following icons have been added: - favicon.svg

Docker Image Updates

The Docker image has been updated recently, with breaking changes. Read the release notes from v2.33.0 to learn how to upgrade.

Changelog

  • 0c34b79a9937b970f2259e37d1f33bab2bddbfab chore(release): 2.36.0
  • 04166e81e52d38b1f66ba3313ccb1291c239eea2 feat: update icons, remove deprecated Microsoft Tiles
  • fae410ce6e7727ee7dab63479a6f08eec15fe5a4 docs: improve custom branding info
  • 9da01be7fc34eeae4a2d0518645769d2614dd554 docs: add update instructions to Docker
  • e9e7c68557b2d54b51185771aa092f0f259ee680 chore: remove symlink in Dockerfile
